title: Which K-pop main vocal is the most capable and skillful in singing? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not expert in singing. I play the piano but god I would rather walk on fire than let someone hear me sing. But really the best out of best IMO is Chen from EXO. Like his album? Masterpiece. I feed myself on that album I needed more than sunny year needs rain. It's magnificent. Love Words is a work of art. And Exo is a band with skilfull singers- Bakehyun is God. DO-pure and perfect, Xumin unique AF...but Chen is a different universe. There is a video of him singing some female song without changing a key and it's mindblowing.  Asking for a female vocalist, my favorite one was always Taeyeon from SNSD but realistically the one with most skills is EXID Solji. I cry listening to her performing 제발 by Lee Sora? It gives you chills. I cry watching that (and I am not a cry baby at all) performance every single time. Uh, chills all over the place it's perfect.

For males, in terms of technique, Super Junior’s vocal line destroy everyone just by Kyuhyun alone. Exo’s vocal line (Chen especially) comes close but I feel like Kyuhyun’s experience wins over Chen. In newer groups, Seventeen’s Seungkwan and DK, NCT’s Taeil and Jaehyun, Monsta X’s Kihyun (and probably a few others that I forgot) show a lot of promise but aren’t quite at SJ and EXO’s level yet. I’m excited to see them improve though. For females, I would say Ailee and Taeyeon though they’re more solo singers. Most of the girl groups with experienced and technicallly good vocalists have already disbanded sadly. In newer groups, Gfriend’s Yuju, Red Velvet’s Wendy, Oh My Girl’s Seunghee and Mamamoo are all very good.

Boy Groups: I would say Jungkook is one of the most capable main vocals out there right now; he’s extremely stable during live performances, his technique is good, and he’s great at singing with emotion. His vocal tone is also very smooth. Girl Groups: This one’s harder than the other for me… some that stand out to me are Jihyo, Solar, Yuju, Taeyeon, and Wendy. But no matter how biased I am, obviously Solar, Yuju, and Taeyeon are unbeatable. Out of these three, I feel like Taeyeon is the most capable. Her voice is strong, and has a lot of emotion.
